articles.title: Asian Boxing Championships 2021 Live: Mary Kom, Lalbuatsaihi Bag Silver Medal - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: 2021 Asian Boxing Championships Live Updates: Pooja Rani won in her category to win India's first gold medal on Sunday. MC Mary Kom lost in the final of her category, to Nazym Kyzaibay. Lalbuatsaihi also won a silver medal.
articles.content: MC Mary Kom crashed to a narrow split-decision defeat against Kazakhstan's Nazym Kyzaibay in the women's 51kg final at the Asian Boxing Championships, in Dubai on Sunday. The legendary Indian boxer h… [+422 chars]

articles.author: Muireann Duffy
articles.title: Beekeepers urgently sought as Asian hornet reaches Ireland - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The Asian hornet preys on honeybees, wasps and other insects, and is responsible for the loss of almost 50 per cent of bee hives in some European regions.
articles.content:
Beekeepers are being urgently sought in order to participate in a research project to act as a crucial line of defence following the arrival in Ireland of the Asian hornet for the first time.
The As… [+2973 chars]

articles.title: Next wave can't be predicted, says WHO regional director on India Covid situation - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Vaccination at the first available opportunity will be India's way to prevent another wave, the timing of which can't be predicted, director of World Health Organization, South-East Asia, Dr Poonam Khetrapal Singh said. | Latest News India
